paymentInstruction.KlikBCA:
1. Login in page by using the BCA Click User ID KlikBCA {bankId}
  2. Select Payment e-Commerce on the main menu Click BCA
  3. Select Market Place on selection Category
  4. Select BLIBLI.COM in the selection Company Name
  5. Select your BCA account number, and then click Continue
  6. Give a checklist on the transactions you want to pay, then click Continue
paymentInstruction.ATMBCA:
1. Select OTHER TRANSACTION on the main screen
  2. Select PAYMENT
  3. Select NEXT SCREEN
  4. Select OTHERS
  5. Enter the code BLIBLI.com companies: 710710
  6. Enter Order Number BLIBLI.COM: {orderId} (valid for one transaction)
  7. Re-check your payment, make sure it is in accordance with your order
  8. Transaction is completed, you will receive receipt of payment
paymentInstruction.VirtualAccountBcaOnline:
1. Login to M-BCA application, enter your M-BCA PIN
  2. Select "m-Transfer", select "BCA Virtual Account"
  3. Click on "Input no. Virtual Account", then input your BCA Virtual Account Number {accountNumber}
  4. Click "OK" & "Send"
  5. Check the transaction data and then select "OK"
  6. Enter the amount of your transaction, fill "Berita" column with your order number ({orderId}), klik "OK", then enter your M-BCA PIN
  7. Re-check the transaction data, then click "OK"
  8. Your order will be processed, please check your email
KlikBCA
  1. Log in KlikBCA application, enter user ID & PIN
  2. Select the "Transfer Funds", and then select "Transfer to BCA Virtual Account"
  3. Enter BCA Virtual Account Number {accountNumber} & click "Continue"
  4. Enter the nominal transferred, fill the "News" column with the order number ({orderId}) & click "Continue".
  5. Make sure the data entered is correct, and Input "Response KeyBCA", then click "Submit".
ATM BCA
  1. Insert your ATM card and input your PIN
  2. Select "Other Transaction" menu
  3. Select "Transfer" menu and select "BCA Virtual Account"
  4. Input your BCA Virtual Account Number {accountNumber} and click "Continue"
  5. Make sure the data entered is correct and click Yes
paymentInstruction.MandiriBillPayment:
ATM Mandiri
  1. Enter your ATM PIN
  2. In the main menu, choose Pembayaran
  3. Select Multi Payment menu
  4. Input number {bankId} in the Kode Perusahaan and then select Benar button
  5. Input payment code {accountNumber}, you will get payment detail information
  6. Re-check Kode Perusahaan, No. Order, and Jumlah Pembayaran
  7. Choose Ya
  8. Your transcation is successfull
Mandiri Internet Banking

  1. Login to your Internet Banking Mandiri
  2. In the main menu, select Bayar
  3. Choose Multi Payment
  4. Choose your account in Dari Rekening, then choose Midtrans in Penyedia Jasa Layanan
  5. Input payment code {accountNumber}, click Next
  6. Re-check Nama Perusahaan, No. Order, and Jumlah Pembayaran
  7. Finish the payment using Mandiri Token
paymentInstruction.AtmBersama:
1. Visit nearest ATM with logo ATMBersama
  2. Select the Transfer feature
  3. Select the Transfer Menu between Bank
  4. Enter code 987 and destination account number {virtualAccountNumber}
  5. Enter nominal of transaction
  6. Confirmation your transaction data
  7. Click next/ok
  8. Transaction completed
paymentInstruction.VirtualAccountMandiri:
1. Select the delivery channels (ATM, EDC, Internet Banking, SMS Banking).
  2. Select the Transfer feature.
  3. Select the Transfer between Bank.
  4. Enter Bank Mandiri Code (008) or select Bank Mandiri.
  5. Enter the nominal of payment and {accountNumber} as the destination account number (Account number is unique, different for each customer and is only valid for one transaction).
  6. Confirm nominal and the destination account number.
  7. Complete your transfer

sessionEnded.title: Shopping Time Ends
sessionEnded.description: You have passed the checkout deadline given in this session. Relax, you can try again by repeating the shopping process from the start.
